snippet: Donald J. Trump promised to turn a landmark into a top luxury hotel, and said that “cost is no object” in his restoration of the Old Post Office Building on Pennsylvania Avenue.
abstract: Donald J Trump promises to turn Washington's landmark Old Post Office Building on Pennsylvania Avenue into top luxury hotel.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump promised to turn a landmark into a top luxury hotel, and said that “cost is no object” in his restoration of the Old Post Office Building on Pennsylvania Avenue.
